1. Create a virtual env within the checkout project
     python3 =m venv my_venv
2. Activate the virtual env
     source my_venv/bin/activate
3. Install needed package to run demo
     python -m pip install -r requirements.txt
4. python demo.py

Example output:
INFO:ECDSA-DEMO:secret key is [7378153587298286101980284963160391050554704877984654912417707169229937726451]
INFO:ECDSA-DEMO:k is 157782365574048866017263285410460510128
INFO:ECDSA-DEMO:sign message [blah] resulting in signature: [r:49296611868117764330466576941257994411260963751843899104524289916026303406751] [s:94988263639768785363607603179122787342223123753970664014080818976093706747532]
INFO:ECDSA-DEMO:k is 157782365574048866017263285410460510128
INFO:ECDSA-DEMO:sign message [another random msg] resulting in signature: [r:49296611868117764330466576941257994411260963751843899104524289916026303406751] [s:113772461337050403091379622899676435525833092235056834987229786937799290606245]
INFO:ECDSA-DEMO:======= Start to reverse engineer secret key =======
INFO:ECDSA-DEMO:reverse engineer k used: 157782365574048866017263285410460510128
INFO:ECDSA-DEMO:reverse engineer sk used: 7378153587298286101980284963160391050554704877984654912417707169229937726451
